description: Non-material amendment to planning permission Ref. PP/23/01925 to allow the omission of the rear rooflight at ground level; revised stairs to lower-level rear garden at the side; revised stairs with new balustrade / external stair to basement omitted and wall position adjusted at front; two rooflights replaced with single rooflight rationalised with interior layout at rear ground floor level; internal redundant chimney breast removed; roof light positions adjusted and sizes reduced at roof level; amendments to external window and door position and sizing for consistency; front door height reduced and sidelights omitted; existing window opening retained at first floor; and changes to internal layouts on each floor.
